title: xtraelv
author: xtraelv
created_time: September 13, 2022, 12:50:41 PMLast edit: September 14, 2022, 04:02:51 AM by xtraelv
content: Edited since I think I misunderstood the request.

comments.author: mocacinno
comments.body: Quote from: xtraelv on September 13, 2022, 12:50:41 PM--snip--I've never posted feedback on. wwzsocki. The only user that contacted me a few months earlier was     ziyush. He's probably talking about your trustlist instead of negative feedback on his trustpage:https://loyce.club/trust/2020-08-22_Sat_05.07h/897509.htmlBut when he says he has contacted you before, but you have no record of such a PM might be an indication of being an alt... Whether or not it's sufficient proof: i have no idear...

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Considering they are alt (There are possibility that they may not be too)It's absolutely fine to have alt accounts in the forum. If someone message you in private and if you feel they somehow exposed their alts then isn't it better to keep it that way? At least I would keep it private by any means unless I find they are practicing unofficial forbidden things like working in signature campaign from the both accounts if the campaign manager has strict rule not to enroll alt accounts. I will message them privately first to give them a chance before I bring it in public.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on September 13, 2022, 01:23:41 PMIt's absolutely fine to have alt accounts in the forum. If someone message you in private and if you feel they somehow exposed their alts then isn't it better to keep it that way? At least I would keep it private by any means unless I find they are practicing unofficial forbidden things like working in signature campaign from the both accounts if the campaign manager has strict rule not to enroll alt accounts. Account Ziyush has a negative reputation for running scam service while user wwzsocki is a trusted user here in the forum. The OP will not gonna waste time posting this thread if both accounts has a clear reputation. Probably to warn other user that dealing on the other account if the connection is valid.I doubt that this enough evidence to connect 2 accounts here base on the typical guidelines of investigator here in the forum.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: I am trying to understand the situation.Quote from: Eternad on September 13, 2022, 01:31:08 PMAccount Ziyush has a negative reputation for running scam service while user wwzsocki is a trusted user here in the forum. The OP will not gonna waste time posting this thread if both accounts has a clear reputation. Probably to warn other user that dealing on the other account if the connection is valid.I just had a quick look on Ziyush's trust page. It seems OP and Ziyush had issue with Cryptopia. OP was arguing in favour of Cryptopia and Ziyush was arguing against it. Is this the result of the two feedback left by OP? To me it seems it's the result of the argument. Please correct me if I am wrong.On the other hand Ziyush sent a negative feedback to OP which also reflects issue with Cryptopia.Clearly it's between two guys who did not have common interest and wanted to protect each others project or project they like.The other feedback on ziyush feedback page is about nothing but a dead project. In 2017/2018 we had so many of them.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: OP, You have the right to publish whatever you want on the forum as long as you do not violate its rules. But, frankly, I do not see a good reason for you to publish these suspicions to the public, as long as the two accounts are not involved in suspicious activities. Given that having more than one account on the forum is allowed, the desire of the owner of both accounts to keep this a private decision, I think it is good for the rest to respect it.This is in addition to the difference in the situation that you encountered with each of the two accounts. I don't think you are posting this just for defamation. Or maybe you want the rest of the members to search for stronger connections between the two accounts just based on suspicion .

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: It would be worth looking into the profiles that tried to leave ziyush what seems to be fake positive feedback. perhaps, the person had no idea how the trust system works and thought he would manipulate it using a bunch of alts that were not on DTQuote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 olkah    2018-11-12        GoodQuote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 Bitexlive Info    2018-11-12        its safe to use bitsum telegram walletQuote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 Destek Bitexlive    2018-10-05        I see this money holder working for the project. I find her reliable.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 Floo1    2018-04-15        I've been using this coin in telegrams for 4 months. It's convenient. BITSUM has a fast growing community and excellent tools.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 idrisalomagold    2018-04-14        Anyone rating bitsum negatively is assumed to be paid to do so. Bitsum is very reliable, trustworthy and hardworking in delivering as promised.The project is growing fast and making waves. I and my downlines have never had any issues with it.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 Jewel2895    2018-04-14        Bitsum telegram wallet is safe to use.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 zool2003    2018-04-14        You can have your own wallet which can operate on your own machine completely independent of the telegram app and when mining the coins can go into a wallet that has nothing to do with telegram so you can transfer what ever amount you would like there. I think your reason is floored tbh if you were involved in the coin you would be in the telegram group with the benefit of more information.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 combat007    2018-04-11    Reference    awesome coin to mine. meseenger is the future and coins associated with them are fortune..Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=1546400 ranchi    2018-04-10    Reference    Bitsum have personel telegram wallet and that is controlled by user,

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: If I understand correctly, user ziyush complains about the negative feedback you left him, while wwzsocki talking about you being added to your distrust list. He clearly cares about being a DT member.there is not much connection here to connect as alt accounts, the only thing that is similar is that they sent you some kind of request via PM.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on September 13, 2022, 07:54:19 PMIf I understand correctly, user ziyush complains about the negative feedback you left him, while wwzsocki talking about you being added to your distrust list. He clearly cares about being a DT member.there is not much connection here to connect as alt accounts, the only thing that is similar is that they sent you some kind of request via PM.Even if there was enough to connect them, why does it matter? Alts are allowed.OP if you think these 2 are alts, then post in the user generated alts thread. Maybe someone there would be interested in investigating.

comments.author: Stalker22

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on September 13, 2022, 08:57:31 PMEven if there was enough to connect them, why does it matter? Alts are allowed.OP if you think these 2 are alts, then post in the user generated alts thread. Maybe someone there would be interested in investigating.I rather something more than the OP possibly forgetting they deleted a PM from a random, then months later trying to weakly connect two seemingly random UID's.Stalker22 has dug that little bit deeper which is what the OP should have done first.
